summary: In 1933 Texas, a schoolteacher and aspiring writer meets a pulp fiction writer, and a relationship soon develops between the two, but it is doomed by his slavishly devotion to his ailing mother and insistence on his freedom.
cast: Vincent D'Onofrio|Ren√©e Zellweger|Ann Wedgeworth|Harve Presnell|Benjamin Mouton|Helen Cates|Leslie Buesing|Chris Shearer|Sandy Walper|Marion Eaton|Dell Aldrich|Libby Villari|Michael Corbett|Antonia Bogdanovich|Elizabeth D'Onofrio|Stephen Marshall|Bridgett
title: El que caminaba solo
